question:
Quiz ;)    Most fish use their side, back, and tail fins for swimming. Fins (1) … movable, fanlike parts. A fish (2) … through the water by swinging its tail fins back and forth. A fish uses (3) … other fins to steer (4) … to stop. Sometimes the other fins also help it go fast through the water.
 Most fishes have bodies shaped like a torpedo. Their bodies are pointed at the head and at the tail. This streamlined body helps fish speed through water. Sailfish can swim as (5) … as 70 miles per hour (110 kilometers per hour).
(6) … fish have unusual shapes. Rays have flat, disc-shaped bodies. Large fins like wings go out from a ray’s head. To swim, rays flap the fins.
 Most fish also have swim bladders. They fill their swim bladders (7) … air. Their air-filled swim bladders act like life jackets. They keep the fish from sinking to the bottom.

Perintah : Lengkapi kalimat Rumpang menjadi kalimat efektif.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Most fish use their side, back, and tail fins for swimming. Fins (1) are movable, fanlike parts. A fish (2)swims through the water by swinging its tail fins back and forth. A fish uses (3) its other fins to steer (4) its body to stop. Sometimes the other fins also help it go fast through the water.

Most fishes have bodies shaped like a torpedo. Their bodies are pointed at the head and at the tail. This streamlined body helps fish speed through water. Sailfish can swim as (5)fast as 70 miles per hour (110 kilometers per hour).

(6)many fish have unusual shapes. Rays have flat, disc-shaped bodies. Large fins like wings go out from a ray’s head. To swim, rays flap the fins.

Most fish also have swim bladders. They fill their swim bladders (7) contain air. Their air-filled swim bladders act like life jackets. They keep the fish from sinking to the bottom.

  • Lebih simpelnya jawabannya!!!
  • 1.are
  • 2.swims
  • 3.its
  • 4.its body
  • 5.fast
  • 6.many
  • 7.contain

*

related_questions.question:
Write a short dialog based on the given situasion. 

SITUATION : introduce yourself!​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Task 2

Present Perfect Tense

1. I have done lots of horrible jobs.

2. She has drunk milk.

3. I have eaten some pizza.

4. A cat has slept.

5. They have made it.

Penjelasan:

Semua kalimat pada jawaban di atas menggunakan bentuk Present Perfect Tense karena menjelaskan tentang aktivitas kegiatan yang sudah dilakukan di waktu lampau.

Present Perfect Tense:

(+) Subject + Have/Has + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
B. Complete the sentences below using the past perfect in the negative and the    words provided.
Ex. My house was very dirty when she came over because.... (Il not clean/ for
weeks) My house was very dirty when she came over because I hadn't
cleaned it for weeks.
1. Joe had to study hard for yesterday's test because... (he/not do well/ the week before)
2. I was worried when she didn't arrive on time because... (she/ not be/ late/ before)
3. Judy didn't want to go on the school ski trip because .... (she/not ski/ before)
4. I didn't recognize Ellen at the party because.... (I not/see/ for years)
5. John didn't catch the bus because.... (he/not leave/ the house/ on time​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Lengkapi kalimat di bawah ini dengan menggunakan past perfect dalam bentuk negatif dan the

kata-kata yang disediakan.

Ex. Rumah saya sangat kotor ketika dia datang karena .... (Saya tidak bersih / untuk

minggu) Rumah saya sangat kotor ketika dia datang karena saya tidak

dibersihkan selama berminggu-minggu.

1. Joe harus belajar keras untuk ujian kemarin karena... (dia/tidak mengerjakannya dengan baik/ minggu sebelumnya)

2. Saya khawatir ketika dia tidak datang tepat waktu karena... (dia/ tidak/ terlambat/ sebelumnya)

3. Judy tidak mau ikut perjalanan ski sekolah karena .... (dia/tidak bermain ski/ sebelumnya)

4. Saya tidak mengenali Ellen di pesta karena.... (Saya tidak/melihat/ selama bertahun-tahun)

5. John tidak naik bus karena.... (dia/tidak berangkat/ rumah/ tepat waktu

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu
